item.title: Adding a Public Ingress endpoint to a ROSA Private-Link Cluster
item.description: This is an example guide for creating a public ingress endpoint for a ROSA Private-Link cluster. Be aware of the security implications of creating a public subnet in your ROSA VPC this way. Refer to the blog &ldquo;How to add public Ingress to a PrivateLink ROSA cluster&rdquo; , to expose applications to the internet by deploying in a PrivateLink Red Hat OpenShift Service on AWS (ROSA) cluster within a truly private Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) that doesnâ€™t have an internet gateway attached to it.
